associated_protein.text: The Associated Protein section provides a list of proteins glycosylated with the glycan.
associated_protein.title: Associated Protein

biosynthetic_enzymes.text: The Biosynthetic Enzyme section provides information on enzymes that may have been involved in the biosynthesis of the glycan.
biosynthetic_enzymes.title: Biosynthetic Enzymes

biomarkers.text: The Biomarkers section contains biomarkers that involve the glycan.
biomarkers.title: Biomarkers

expression.text: The Expression section contains information on the expression of the glycan within tissues and cell lines.
expression.title: Expression

digital_sequence.text: The Digital Sequence section displays the sequence of the glycan in various sequence formats.
digital_sequence.title: Digital Sequence

organism.text: The Organism section provides a list of organisms in which the glycan has been reported.
organism.title: Organism

viewer.text: This section provides a 3D view of Glycan.
viewer.title: 3D View

glycan_binding_protein.text: The Glycan Binding Protein section provides a list of proteins that bind the glycan.
glycan_binding_protein.title: Glycan Binding Protein

history.text: The History section provides information about the release in which the accession was introduced, whether it was renamed from other accessions, or merged with another glycan in GlyGen.
history.title: History

general.text: The General section provides identifying information about the glycan from reference databases and sources.
general.title: General

motifs.text: The Motifs section provides information on the glycan motifs present in the glycan.
motifs.title: Motifs

subsumption.text: The Subsumption section provides information about the relationship between the glycan and other glycans with more detailed information (Descendant) or less detailed information (Ancestor).
subsumption.title: Subsumption

cross_references.text: The Cross References section provides a list of database entries and links for the glycan in other databases.
cross_references.title: Cross References

names_synonyms.text: The Names section provides information about the glycan name(s) and synonym(s).
names_synonyms.title: Names

publications.text: The Publications section contains publications where the given glycan was mentioned. The publication information comes from multiple data sources.
publications.title: Publications
